subtitleNullable: Music Tracks(Audio Features, Spotify Links, Tags, Genres) & User History
descriptionNullable:
# About
This is a rebuilt version and subset of The Million Song Dataset¹. It was built up with lastfm-spotify-tags-sim-userdata² (The Echo Nest Taste Profile Subset³ & lastfm-dataset-2020⁴), tagtraum genre annotations⁵, and Spotify API⁶. This dataset including:
- Music Info: 50683 songs (tracks).
- User Listening History: 9711301 records.
- MP3-Example: 100 song per genre, 15 genres, 1500 songs in total.

# Acknowledgements & References
1. [The Million Song Dataset](http://millionsongdataset.com/)
2. [lastfm-spotify-tags-sim-userdata](https://github.com/slettner/lastfm-spotify-tags-sim-userdata)
3. [The Echo Nest Taste Profile Subset](http://millionsongdataset.com/tasteprofile/)
4. [lastfm-dataset-2020](https://github.com/renesemela/lastfm-dataset-2020)
5. [tagtraum genre annotations](https://www.tagtraum.com/msd_genre_datasets.html)
6. [Spotify API](https://developer.spotify.com/documentation/web-api)
title: Million Song Dataset + Spotify + Last.fm
